message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you right now, as the value of the money decreases over time.
I think we can do better than your initial offer. Since the money is worth less to you in each round, I'll take a bit more. Let's split it 55-45.
Bob, let's be realistic. The longer this goes on, the less the money is worth to me. I'll take $55, you take $45.  This is my final offer.
I see you're getting desperate. Since the money is still worth the same to me, I'll take a bigger share. You should accept this offer before the value drops even further for you.
